Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1437 SOUTH BOULDER AVENUE,SUITE 1400, TULSA, Oklahoma, 74119, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Helmerich & Payne has the largest fleet of U.S. land drilling rigs. The company's FlexRig line is the leading choice to drill horizontal wells for production of U.S. tight oil and gas. H&P is present in nearly every major U.S. shale play and also has a small presence internationally.
